alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 30 at 1:52AM MST until December 30 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow, with winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility as low as one-half mile or less at times. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Cascade, Fergus and Judith Basin Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Noon MST today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
